title: NA 10â‚¬ Card
body: A friend gave me this card :( can someone trade it with me on euw?

replies.body: RP cards are specific to each region, but we might be able to help.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will find some options for you!
